name: A Witch's Tale (itch)
description:
Description:

Join Lilith on an adventure to defeat monsters in the corrupted forest. Obtain Clovers each time you clear a room, offer it to the Spirit's Fountain to receive new powers. Use different combination of spells to reach further into the woods. The layout of the forest will change each time you venture into it.

Controls:

WASD = Movement

Spacebar = Dash

Ctrl = Open Spells Select Menu

Mouse Movement = Aim

Left Click = Primary Spell

Right Click = Secondary Spell

Mouse Scroll = Cycle Spells when Spells Select Menu is open

Escape = Pause

Credits:

VFX Artist: Larry Lijuwardi • Tamara Ana
